functionalj.lens.lenses

Interface AnyLens<HOST,DATA>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnyAccess<HOST,DATA>, Func1<HOST,DATA>, Function<HOST,DATA>, WriteLens<HOST,DATA>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BigDecimalLens<HOST>, BigIntegerLens<HOST>, BooleanLens<HOST>, ComparableLens<HOST,TYPE>, DoubleLens<HOST>, FuncListLens<HOST,TYPE,TYPELENS>, FuncMapLens<HOST,KEY,VALUE,KEYLENS,VALUELENS>, IntegerLens<HOST>, IntIntTupleLens<HOST>, IntTuple2Lens<HOST,T2,T2LENS>, ListLens<HOST,TYPE,TYPELENS>, LongLens<HOST>, MapLens<HOST,KEY,VALUE,KEYLENS,VALUELENS>, NullableLens<HOST,TYPE,SUBLENS>, ObjectLens<HOST,DATA>, OptionalLens<HOST,TYPE,SUBLENS>, ResultLens<HOST,TYPE,SUBLENS>, StringLens<HOST>, Tuple2Lens<HOST,T1,T2,T1LENS,T2LENS>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Accesses.TheListLens, Accesses.TheTuple2Lens, AnyLens.Impl, BigDecimalLens.Impl, BigIntegerLens.Impl, BooleanLens.Impl, ComparableLens.Impl, DayOfWeekLens, DoubleLens.Impl, DurationLens, FuncListLens.Impl, FuncMapLens.Impl, InstantLens, IntegerLens.Impl, IntTuple2Lens.Impl, ListLens.Impl, LocalDateLens, LocalDateTimeLens, LocalTimeLens, LongLens.Impl, MapLens.Impl, MonthLens, NullableLens.Impl, ObjectLens.Impl, ObjectLensImpl, OffsetDateTimeLens, OptionalLens.Impl, PeriodLens, ResultLens.Impl, StringLens.Impl, Tuple2Lens.Impl, Validation.ToBoolean.ToBooleanLens, Validation.ToException.ToExceptionLens, Validation.ToMessage.ToMessageLens, Validation.ValidationLens, ZonedDateTimeLens, ZoneIdLens, ZoneOffsetLens, ZoneOffsetTransitionLens, ZoneOffsetTransitionRuleLens
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface AnyLens<HOST,DATA>
extends AnyAccess<HOST,DATA>, WriteLens<HOST,DATA>
